document_data.name: Magpie
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite polyhedron/91/The Living City: The Swineherd's House|18}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Magpies''' were a mundane avian species in the Realms.
document_data.Description: The song produced by magpies sounded like "queg queg queg..."
document_data.Behavior: Magpies were highly attracted to small, shiny or brightly-colored objects, such as [[gem]]s or rings. They would often swoop down and steal such objects without ever touching the ground, taking it back to their nest.
document_data.Combat: These birds were adverse to fighting, even when threatened.

Ecology.Habitats: Magpies typically lived in forests, farm lands, and even the urban areas of regions with a temperate climate.
Ecology.Relationships: In the Realms, magpies acted as [[favored animal|servants]] of the [[deity]] [[Gwaeron Windstrom]].{{Cite web enhancement/Deity Do's and Don'ts|12}} One of the tasks they would carry out for him would be to obscure clues indicating a trail from a follower's foes or to reveal such clues to his favored trackers.

document_data.Notable Magpies: * [[Horace]], an unusually intelligent magpie that was owned and trained by a [[thief]] in [[the Vast]] known as [[Sigird Sigirdson]].
document_data.Trivia: In the [[Kara-Tur]] city of [[Balanzia]], there was an inn known as the [[Yellow Magpie Inn|Yellow Magpie]].
